description: * Frontend:   * React   * AntDesign * Backend   * Spring Boot   * Hibernet * Database   * MySQL * Network   * Fetch api ## Customer Functions * Login ![Login](./assets/Login.png) * Register ![Register](./assets/Register.png) * Logout ![Logout](./assets/Logout.png) * Home ![Home](./assets/Home.png) * Search Book ![Search](./assets/SearchBookList.png) * Book Detail ![Detail](./assets/ProductDetail.png) * Cart ![Cart](./assets/Cart.png) * Check out ![Checkout](./assets/Checkout.png) * Order record ![Order](./assets/OrderList.png) ## Admin Functions * User manage(ban/unban) ![UserManage](./assets/UserManage.png) * Book manage(add/delete/edit) ![BookManage](./assets/BookManage.png) * User sales rank ![Usersales](./assets/UserSales.png) * Book sales rank ![Booksales](./assets/BookSales.png)
